q: 2011 Earlier this week`` The X Factor'''s Simon Cowell confessed that he is a`` massive fan of Paula Abdul .'' On Tuesday night Paula Abdul told Jay Leno that she felt that was an understatement. I think you need to take` mass' off and put` obsessive,' said Paula Abdul when asked about her thoughts on Simon Cowell 's comment. The singer then clarified,`` He's obsessed with me.'' As an Idol judge, Steven Tyler admitted he's not another Simon Cowell , and, against Howard Stern 's wishes, you won't regularly find him critiquing contestant's physical appearances. You can't prejudice a situation like that, he told Howard Stern .`` To a certain extent you can say` You don't look like a star, you don't walk, talk and act like a star so get out of there.''
